name: The Rewind Factory (itch)
description:
The Rewind Factory is a game for the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2

In this action/puzzle game you are a programmer who must fix The Rewind Factory computer. Angry robots are in your way and you have limited ammo,  use your rewind effect to get the ammo back. 

This was my first game jam, so hopefully you liked it. If you have remarks, please leave a comment below!
